scripts.mochawesome_report: marge --reportDir cypress/reports/mochawesome-html-report -t Cypress_Test_Report -p Cypress_HMTL_Report -f Cypress_HMTL_Report --charts true output.json
scripts.cy:report-cy-dashboard: npm run cleanup && npm run cy_dashboard && npm run merge_reports && npm run mochawesome_report
scripts.cy:run-report: npx cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/*.json > cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/output.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/output.json --output cypress/reports/mochawesome-report
